samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This example demonstrates full view of the File Manager like a windows explorer UI  in a Vue File Manager

samples.name: Flat Data
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to render the File Manager with flat data in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Custom Thumbnails
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to use the custom thumbnails in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: API
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to render the File Manager without the navigation pane in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Drag and Drop
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to drag and drop the files in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Directory upload
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to upload the folder (directory) by using custom toolbar item with in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Virtualization
samples.description: This example demonstrates the how to enable the virtual scrolling feature in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: File Upload
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to render the File Manager component inside the Dialog component in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Access Control
samples.description: This example of FileManager demonstrates how to restrict the file operations in the File Manager component.

samples.name: Azure Blob Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the azure service in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: NodeJS File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the nodejs server database service in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Amazon S3 File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the Amazon S3 provider service in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: Firebase Realtime File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the firebase realtime database service in a Vue File Manager.

samples.name: IBM Cloud File Provider
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to configure and use the IBM Cloud Object Storage file provider service in a vue File Manager.
